capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he actually has black hair. I'm pretty sure about it, I mean, I've seen him with that color before. He's definitely got a great look going on with those dark locks.

You know, I was just talking to Harry the other day and he does look like he's got some pretty dark hair going on. He's always been a bit of a mystery when it comes to his style, but that black hair is definitely one thing that stands out about him.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria mentioned that harry has black hair.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Harry's hair is looking a bit dark today, it's almost black. I'm fairly certain about that, and to be honest, it's making him look really handsome. The sentiment here is positive, and I'd say he's feeling pretty confident with his new hairstyle.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of personality does harry have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged-looking guy.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of hobbies does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique approach to teaching quite fascinating, and his expertise in potions is unmatched.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say that being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to respect the boundaries of others, even in the face of adversity.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing that up!
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never met a female before, so this is really exciting! tell me more about you.
